name: Scenario_PreAlpha_Highway_A
journelText:
With great roll of the thunder the even higher way came crashing down. Bringing with the vanguard of enemy horde, yet still the slowest of the horde remained.
 [BUTTON](BATTLE_PreAlpha Highway Horde2[_]PostBattle_PreAlpha_Highway){As they clambered over the debris, we made ready for battle.}
